Source Block:
`ifdef TARGET_SIM   
   assign out[DW-1:0] = ((vdd===1'b1) && (vss===1'b0)) ? ({(DW){niso}} & in[DW-1:0]):
		                                         {(DW){1'bX}};
`else
   generate
      if(ASIC)	
	begin
	   asic_iso i_iso [DW-1:0] (.vdd(vdd),
				    .vss(vss),
				    .in(in[DW-1:0]),
				    .out(out[DW-1:0]));
	end
      else
	begin
	   assign out[DW-1:0] = {(DW){niso}} & in[DW-1:0];
	end
   endgenerate
`endif
   
endmodule // oh_buf
